column3: “Also makes you horny and uninhibited”

“Strain Name: Strawberry Kush 
Grade: A-) Must see.
Type: Indica Dom. 80/20
Looks: A) Forest of orange hairs almost totaly covers those big, dense and dark green buds.
Smell: A) No need to tell. You know strawberrys and probably kush too. Nice mix.
Taste: B+) Smooth and sweet on inhale. Touch of lime and apricot. Little harsh on exhale, strawberry and kush comming out stonger.
Effects: A-) Strong strain of kush but no...”

“Tingles immediately rush your face and head while your whole body not only soothingly relaxes - but feels extra GOOD! Wonderfully pleasant body high. Soft and deceivingly light because it does have weight...both mentally and physically. The ecstasy induced by this strain translates perfectly for sex!

Mood is incredibly soaring, uplifting, euphoric, and happy. Although, difficult to accomplish anything because all yo...”

“Migraine pain 5-6; nausea 8 when I medicated round 1830 or so. Takes bout 5-10 in to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (an absolute must for me). Body high allowed me to eat dinner. Head high glued me to the couch which was a-ok wit me. My day was miserable for pain/nausea before medicating. Only reason I dint go sleep was cuz my legs were restless. Not sure what's up wit that. Definitely a sleeper...”

“Super kush strain my buds smell like a sweet kush aroma with deep frizzy red hairs all over. tastes really good and smokes the most I've ever had, really thick and tasty smoke but very harsh. I'd buy an ounce of this if I could but it knocks me out so quick since it's so damn sedative. buy this strain if you love kush”

“A very 'precious' strain - it has a sweet, sugary aftertaste. The high is warm and gentle; no anxiety or paranoia. Overall, I feel happy, relaxed, and completely peaceful. It has creeper tendencies, which might have encouraged me to take a hit or two more than I needed, but nonetheless I do not feel anxious. Just very heavy and content.”
“It was my fisrt time I ever smoked weed, and it was fucking amazing. Great weed”

“i had Strawberry Tahoe Kush 

Super Trichomed Out 
 
Great for: Pain | Nausea | Stress | Insomnia | Appetite loss | Uplifting mood”

“Im like a kid in a candy store today,stawberry cough and Strawberry Kush concentrates! The Strawberry Kush is beautiful and gives of oddly delicious fruity/piney smell. After hitting my rig, the taste was intensified, with a strong berry/piney kush taste that you want to keep on tasting. The effects were very balanced, untill i did 3  rips in a 20min period. I did feel couch lock setting in. Very relaxing with a non ...”

“Unique bright smell. Lovely sweet taste. Strong. Penetrating effects that wiped away stress and anchored me down to become deeply lost in what I was doing. Put a real smile on my face.

PROS: Delicious, very dense, quite potent, penetrates body, mellowing effects, noticeable euphoric effects, sleepy

CONS: Oddly alternating from A.D.D. to ability to focus, dry eyes, dry mouth (but milk worked well for that), lost...”

“One of my favorite strains. Sticky bud good smell. U know ur getting good quality strawberry kush when it smells like Smuckers strawberry jam. High potency. This bud will definitely help any appetite problems u have ;)”

“Very strawberry.  I asked a non-smoker, they said it smelled like strawberry with something else.  To me it wasn't quite that strong, although with lower tolerances one can more than likely get quite 'Medicated'.  This strain has a very pleasant taste and smell, very strawberry like as well.  This is a good indica, but it lacks in strength for me.  Overall, it may cause couch lock to low tolerances, adding a partial ...”
“Awwwwwweeeeeeeesssssome!!!!!!  Definitely one of my favs.  Great for anyone suffering from PTSD and anxiety.  Makes stress evaporate.”
“shit fuxked me up, i smoked 5 bowls and thought i could read peoples minds by putting my hand on their heads. 10/10 would do again! high recommend smoking at least 3 bowls.”
“Great evening med when I need to wind down for an hour then sleep well. The flavor is so nice it seems a waste to smoke it. Vape this bud 🍓🍓”
“So good for my anxiety! Feeling like I can breathe for the first time :))))”
“So good for my anxiety! Feeling like I can breathe for the first time :))))”
“This is the weed we smoked on my favorite day of getting high”
“Love the high. It definitely helped with my nausea and anxiety”

“I don't know if I was just really high from before, but I took one good hit of this and went to space. The smoke was very thick and a little too rough for my taste. For nearly thirty minutes I had waves of tingling running from head to toe. Everything had a bit of motion blur and I could not make a logical thought without forgetting it. It made me very dizzy and disoriented, and it kinda made me nervous . I'm fairly ...”

“Hybrid with 75% Sativa; gives a good head-high. Causes quite a bit of paranoia and probably not the strand for those with anxiety, but for those without, the paranoia is manageable and you will still feel happy and raised most of the time. Hits quite quickly and is a bit strong. Will cause dry eyes and dry mouth along with making you a bit Dazed & Confused, but still creates quite a happy and HIGH high (You'll be fly...”

“As a sufferer of extreme social anxiety and horrible gagging and coughing attacks, this stuff has literally saved my sanity. Very very sedating, but not with terrible munchies! Life is going to suck when it's gone :( I need North Carolina to go medical legal so I can function and live a normal life! I'm done being big pharmas guinea pig.”

“Strawberry Kush! The ultimative sativastrain.
So I went to Barcelona with my class, a friend of mine said I should come over to his place before the departure to Barcelona. Then I smoked 3 hits from this strain. First of all: the taste and the smell were both heavily berry like. Also a bit sweet. 
My friend and me then went to our bus straight to Barcelona. I already felt a constant flash when jumping out of the car....”

“Used my new PAX by ploom vape for the second time tonight. I took about a half dozen draws and then enjoyed the high. My mind was whirling with these vivid daydreams and tangents. I cannot over state how lovely I was feeling.”
“Very little gave me a  good high that lasted a long time, this was actually the first weed I ever smoked and still by far my favorite, and I've hsmoked G13 and Bubba Kush before”

“This perticulair kush smells very fruity/ lemony in my opinion i got it from a Indoor Grower in Aruba very nicely cured buds and nugs and the high is very smooth the only negative attribute it has it gives me the munchies.”

“A nice fruity, sweet, strain with a hint of strawberry. Rips pretty smoothly. It’s probably one of the better fruit based Kush out there. If you like this strain I’d strongly recommend cannalope haze”

“This strain awesome, it is very relaxing but not overly sedating which allows you to either socialize easily and calmly or to sleep soundly. It also has very little effect on hunger or thirst when vaporized. Very good for anxiety and insomnia.”

“This strain is seriosuly the best one ive had YET!! its truly just amazing and makes your body feel light and heavy at the SAME TIME the head high is top tier and u feel so relaxed! this strain (as quoted from my friend) gives you a sense of nostalgia, it makes you feel like how you felt when u first got high.”

“I've had Strawberry Kush probably more than any other strain and it is definitely a good strain, but since there is little to no head high, the feeling isn't the best; but I still enjoy the body high and it is a greatly euphoric feeling, it would be great to sit down and watch a trippy movie or something like that. 8/10.”

“This is a very good smelling strain and tastes even better. Very heavy Indica. love this strain would definitely recommend to anyone who doesn't like to lose there shit while high. Helps with depression i would say, being a depressed asshole like myself i would say this definitely helped me out a bit.”

“Picked up this strain for the first time this week. Beautiful, tight green and orange colored buds. The smell to this strain is amazing. This is a good night time smoke due to its Indica roots. Nice body high that will lull you to sleep.”

“This is a very good smelling strain and tastes even better. Very heavy Indica. love this strain would definitely recommend to anyone who doesn't like to lose there shit while high. Helps with depression i would say, being a depressed asshole like myself i would say this definitely helped me out a bit.”

“This strain is seriosuly the best one ive had YET!! its truly just amazing and makes your body feel light and heavy at the SAME TIME the head high is top tier and u feel so relaxed! this strain (as quoted from my friend) gives you a sense of nostalgia, it makes you feel like how you felt when u first got high.”

“I've had Strawberry Kush probably more than any other strain and it is definitely a good strain, but since there is little to no head high, the feeling isn't the best; but I still enjoy the body high and it is a greatly euphoric feeling, it would be great to sit down and watch a trippy movie or something like that. 8/10.”

“Just what I needed!  This helped with my anxiety on a huge level.  Strawberry Kush is my go to after a rough day and I just need to relax and subside some physical pain.  It does not knock me out like others...if I want to stay awake and enjoy, I can.  If I want to sleep, I can.”
“Kickass stuff. Can't wait to get more.”
“Very relaxing mood. Stupid stuff is funny. Helps sleeping. Tastes kinda like a candy afterwards. Munchies and cotton mouth though.”

“This is what I like about strawberry kush: You smell it and it smells like strawberrys, you smoke it and it smokes super smooth with a sweet fruity flavor with an earthy aftertaste. Super potent. Amazing. The high is for extreme cases of insomnia as it will put you in a extreme kush state that hopelesslyends with a deep intense and refreshing sleep. 4.5/5”
“Smells and tastes like strawberry”
“this was my first homegrow attempt (from seed, despite the clone only" warning). they turned out WAY better than i anticipated! a great
column5: & very fun grow for the first time. it seems to have a reputation for forgiving hardiness. it definitely held in there despite my missteps!

column1: most reviews are spot on for me
it lets the body do the ta...”"

column3: “I'm in love!! Great hybrid, plain and simple. The happy, uplifting Strawberry blends beautifully with the Kush. Loved this for daytime use -- helps with pain without knocking me to sleep. Hope to see this beauty at AZ Organix more often :P”

“This is what I like about strawberry kush: You smell it and it smells like strawberrys, you smoke it and it smokes super smooth with a sweet fruity flavor with an earthy aftertaste. Super potent. Amazing. The high is for extreme cases of insomnia as it will put you in a extreme kush state that hopelesslyends with a deep intense and refreshing sleep. 4.5/5”

“This strain was fast and easy to grow. The smell has a hint of berry.  The berry taste isn't strong so it has a earthy punch to it. Gave me a good high but too much will make you get that head high so don't go overboard when smoking it. Overall it is a good strain to try out!
#420sweepstakes”

“This has become a new favorite for me. However, my experience is drastically different from some user reviews. Perhaps my strain was sativa dominant.  I experienced a wonderful euphoria! I felt slightly energized, and my lust for life was awoken! I could enjoy doing just about anything in this state of mind. I even went to work high, which I haven't done in a long time. Not to worry, I was on my shit and doing it wit...”

“This is hands down the best bud i've ever gotten. The downside however is if you live somewhere you really have to keep this hidden, it is incredibly dank. Stink up your entire house type of dank and no that is not an exaggeration. Great bud, but almost impossible to hide.”

“Vaped this from oil in a cartridge.  Very sweet, very strong.  My experience was definitely more Indica than anything else, although I wasn't locked down.  Somewhat of a clear headed, body relaxed state of mind.  Clear headed enough to stay up watching late night TV, yet relaxed enough to totally chill while doing it. This is a favorite and I'd highly recommend it for kicking back, or doing fun things - maybe not for...”
“Kickass stuff. Can't wait to get more.”

“Vaped this from oil in a cartridge.  Very sweet, very strong.  My experience was definitely more Indica than anything else, although I wasn't locked down.  Somewhat of a clear headed, body relaxed state of mind.  Clear headed enough to stay up watching late night TV, yet relaxed enough to totally chill while doing it. This is a favorite and I'd highly recommend it for kicking back, or doing fun things - maybe not for...”
“I rolled a fat ass joint outta dis shit and it is da bomb!! Got me a really good body high, extremely dry mouth and muchies da fuck!!!”
“Kickass stuff. Can't wait to get more.”
“Very relaxing mood. Stupid stuff is funny. Helps sleeping. Tastes kinda like a candy afterwards. Munchies and cotton mouth though.”
“This is the perfect wake and bake strain, perfect mellow relaxed high that still allows you to get up and have energy and not be sleepy. Great strain for joints.”

“A happy high at times, slight anxiety and a little too much lethargy.

No pain relief, so this isn't a do over for me.”
“Smells and tastes like strawberry”
“got lit asf”
“Smells and tastes like strawberry”

“Nice smell and taste of strawberry and beautiful christmas tree-buds. More sativatraits than most kushstrains. And thats fine by me! More of an upbeat high and a good balance between bofyhigh and headhigh. Try if you like Og kush or critical kush. If you are more Indica-leaning then blueberry/blackberry kush will suit you better..”

“I'm in love!! Great hybrid, plain and simple. The happy, uplifting Strawberry blends beautifully with the Kush. Loved this for daytime use -- helps with pain without knocking me to sleep. Hope to see this beauty at AZ Organix more often :P”

“Just what I needed!  This helped with my anxiety on a huge level.  Strawberry Kush is my go to after a rough day and I just need to relax and subside some physical pain.  It does not knock me out like others...if I want to stay awake and enjoy, I can.  If I want to sleep, I can.”
“Very relaxing mood. Stupid stuff is funny. Helps sleeping. Tastes kinda like a candy afterwards. Munchies and cotton mouth though.”

“You know that feeling at a party when you're just standing there observing people and it's not like you can hear all the details, it's just one blanket of noise? Yeah that is definitely this strain. People were moving way too fast, I thought I was going in slow motion.
 8/10 would smoke again.”
“Great fruity taste and smell. This strain had a great euphoric high and made me extremely hungry. Make sure you have something to drink! It gave me bad cotton mouth.”
“Kickass stuff. Can't wait to get more.”

“This strain was fast and easy to grow. The smell has a hint of berry.  The berry taste isn't strong so it has a earthy punch to it. Gave me a good high but too much will make you get that head high so don't go overboard when smoking it. Overall it is a good strain to try out!
#420sweepstakes”
“I walked into the hotbox 5'11 but walked out 6'2"... I can't stop growing. Please send star command for immediate pick up.

column1: (Warning): May cause tubular feelings of  growth
column2: radical extremities spasms leading to an infectious dance.”"

column3: “Very relaxing mood. Stupid stuff is funny. Helps sleeping. Tastes kinda like a candy afterwards. Munchies and cotton mouth though.”
“Smells and tastes like strawberry”

“At first glance this bright green bud looks tantalizingly tasty. It does not disappoint. Inhale and let the smoke fill your mouth numbing it with a blast of berry flavor. Exhale it as its flavor splashes back over your tingling tongue. Your body will begin to numb and relax. Beautiful strain.”

“Nice smell and taste of strawberry and beautiful christmas tree-buds. More sativatraits than most kushstrains. And thats fine by me! More of an upbeat high and a good balance between bofyhigh and headhigh. Try if you like Og kush or critical kush. If you are more Indica-leaning then blueberry/blackberry kush will suit you better..”

“For starters, I'll say that this is a wonderful strain. Right off the bat from smoking, I felt a bit paranoid, but that was still part of the being caught smoking thing. Once I was comfortable, I felt a very nice euphoric feeling, and felt an increase in passion towards various things that would come up. I also noticed that there was an increase in peaceful thoughts. Overall, a very involved and mid-heavyweight exper...”
“Great fruity taste and smell. This strain had a great euphoric high and made me extremely hungry. Make sure you have something to drink! It gave me bad cotton mouth.”

“At first glance this bright green bud looks tantalizingly tasty. It does not disappoint. Inhale and let the smoke fill your mouth numbing it with a blast of berry flavor. Exhale it as its flavor splashes back over your tingling tongue. Your body will begin to numb and relax. Beautiful strain.”

it lets the body do the ta...”"

column3: “I grew this strain from ILGM. It was easy to grow and smelled like a skunky , fuely fruit on the vine. I vaped it and wow, tastes like strawberry! I love the taste. It isn't the strongest ever, but still does the job and is great for relaxation. A good overall bud.”

“This has become a new favorite for me. However, my experience is drastically different from some user reviews. Perhaps my strain was sativa dominant.  I experienced a wonderful euphoria! I felt slightly energized, and my lust for life was awoken! I could enjoy doing just about anything in this state of mind. I even went to work high, which I haven't done in a long time. Not to worry, I was on my shit and doing it wit...”
“Good high, but had a panic attack during the experience, I'll have to try it again if I can.”

“Took this on an Friday evening, alone in Amsterdam waiting for my connection flight to leave the next day. Plan was to party the night through. After hitting some puffs from a pure this strain knocked me out big time. Got a little panicky and ended up sleeping in the airport laying on a counter. 
I had a very intense head high with my body all super warm especially my central chest feeling like it's burning.
If not c...”

“This strain is something else i must say. Not only does it arrouse your sex drive, you also tend to get madly tired and exhausted. Taste wonderful. Make sure you dont eat anything to flavorful or you wont be able to taste the strawberry after taste. Has a slight harsh burn. For a sativa based im so in love with this strain.”
“Wow. The fruity scent and the relaxing high are great!”
“This strain will put you to sleep boi.”

“The strongest i have grown so far. Really powerful and a very distinct aroma. Very uplifting at the beginning and very sleepy after some time. Grows tall.

A must for growers.”

“One advice: dont smoke it, Vape it! It really tastes like strawberries! second advice vape it btw 365°and 375° not higher thats its sweet spot. Gives you a good uplifted high but still allows you to remain focus. Did not make me too tired.”
“Amazing all around, instantly feel it after 2 hits off the bong, the smell is so good and the taste is like strawberry Fanta, highly recommend you try it when you can”

“Definitely one of the best strains i have smoked, left a nice sensation in the mouth and teeth as well, takes around 10 minutes to kick in but once it does you know it. Wasnt completely couch locked but i started feeling sleepy after a while! Definitely worth a try!!”
“El sabor mas frutal y dulce que eh probado”

“This strain tasted like wood chips smell like.  Leafly gives a good jab at describing it as musky" being a more positive leaning considering patchouli is a nice spicy version.  A bit ranker on the scale would be armpits which can go either way as for attraction.  Strawberry Kush is wet cardboard box musky with a high that is just as flimsy.  The flower structure was nothing short of fabulous with big fluffy light gr...”"
“Beautiful, smooth taste. Don't pass up an opportunity to smoke this.”
“bud smelled like a mid.. smoked it and it had a slight taste of strawberry but not a lot and the high sucked.. wasted 40 bucks on 2 g's..”

“Tonight’s medicine, Strawberry Kush. This one helps me Chillax. It tastes so nice on the exhale. Such a smooth strawberry flavor and yummy kushiness that tickles your throat. The high is super Stoney with a creative buzz and hunger for food, lots of food...followed by a plant your ass in-da-couch and ready yourself for bed in an hour daze. Great nighttime, munch your face off and have a kick ass sleep medication.”

“I taste no strawberry but yeah men it's nice and euphoric.
Enjoy!”
“I tried it with my friends and the effect Happy" is very strong I enjoyed it a lot
column4: the nice thing is being relaxed while enyojing it .. Recommended.”"

column3: “Tastes like strawberry, good Kush”
“good strand”
“Great strain for a party with girls.”
“good strand”
“The very first legit kush" or at least OG kush i ever tried. Really carried from both sides
column4: equally sweet/berry but with that back end of pungency. Leaned more towards sativa in buzz
column5: i do remember it being really cerebral with the onset but faded into relaxation later on.”"

column3: “It's awesome. Great strawberry taste and smell. Smoked 4 bowls then got completely fried. But it's a creeper for sure. Took like 10 mins after I smoked to kick in. I felt sleepy, relaxed, and really happy. More of a indica when I tried it”
“When I was anxious it made my anxiety worse but when I was happy it encouraged that as well (shrug) lol”
“strain info is incorrect. seeds are available, mine just arrived. will update after harvest.”
“First strain that I've ever smoked, made me feel amazing and happy.”
“a nice chill-out indica-dominant strain. not usually a big fan of indica-dominants, but strawberry kush was definitely an exception. sweet, strong, and kind of earthy in a way. wonderful.”

“good flavor and a enjoyable smoke. but on another level it is a great strain for Amputee's battling phantom limb pain which Leafly I would like to see a section in the medical selections please and I'll do my best to keep the reviews coming. helped alot to relax but didn't feel lazy.”
“Had outdoor grown sk and it was fair. Very pleasant. Nice daytime strain that keeps you focused, energetic, still with a very nonchalant body high. No where near my favorite but gets the job done!”

“Really fresh green healthy nugs. Didn’t grind well though. Ran it through the pax 3 vaporiser. Very strong strain. Immediate effect. Long lasting high. Real nice and after about 40 mins the eyes go dry and the body buzz kicks in. Hope you don’t have plans!”
“bud smelled like a mid.. smoked it and it had a slight taste of strawberry but not a lot and the high sucked.. wasted 40 bucks on 2 g's..”
“great fun laughter buzz”
“First strain that I've ever smoked, made me feel amazing and happy.”
“a nice chill-out indica-dominant strain. not usually a big fan of indica-dominants, but strawberry kush was definitely an exception. sweet, strong, and kind of earthy in a way. wonderful.”
“This strain makes gets me high and I really enjoy the medical effects. I rolled my ankle the other day and I dont feel it.”

“It's awesome. Great strawberry taste and smell. Smoked 4 bowls then got completely fried. But it's a creeper for sure. Took like 10 mins after I smoked to kick in. I felt sleepy, relaxed, and really happy. More of a indica when I tried it”
“When I was anxious it made my anxiety worse but when I was happy it encouraged that as well (shrug) lol”
“Great taste. Love it.”
“First strain that I've ever smoked, made me feel amazing and happy.”
“So yummy!”
“a nice chill-out indica-dominant strain. not usually a big fan of indica-dominants, but strawberry kush was definitely an exception. sweet, strong, and kind of earthy in a way. wonderful.”
“Great flavor, with fast relief”
“Great flavor, with fast relief”
“Wonderful body high almost instantly, was able to relax after having this strand. Helped me fall asleep and have a great sleep. Very smooth, specially for someone who doesn't smoke often.”

“2-3 bowls from my water pipe. Watching G.O.T. with my lady.. after a wonderful dinner. 

Perfect strain for it. 

Indica feels! Slightly couch lock but not intense.

Little aroused , no anxiety, great for a chill night .

Flowers: sweet , piney

Nugs are compacted but not dense

Do get head high”
“I remember it had a sweet taste and a nice uplifting head high”

“Took this on an Friday evening, alone in Amsterdam waiting for my connection flight to leave the next day. Plan was to party the night through. After hitting some puffs from a pure this strain knocked me out big time. Got a little panicky and ended up sleeping in the airport laying on a counter. 
I had a very intense head high with my body all super warm especially my central chest feeling like it's burning.
If not c...”

“I had this particular strain in an evape application and it was amazing!! The taste was so sweet and reminiscent of the pure thc that first time i ever had a concentrate. It got me noddin out with my methadone dose so it was obvious this was an extremely potent high thc strain”

“This might not be the case for every dispensary, but when I have the overwhelming physical symptoms of an Anxiety attack, This Lady neutralizes the excess energy, and allows me to calm myself down (Joint or Bowl).  Just a low enough Indica ratio at the place I got it (70%) to where I was able to shrug off the sleepiness effects. Vaporized version tastes more like a strawberry granola.  Had great pain relief on the va...”
“First time It had me high for hours.”
“¿feels like how the colors cinnamon brown, banana white, and pomegranate red¿”
“Bomb! Super kush”

“This strain has a very earthy and sweet taste. This strain is a great indica especially if you just need to relax or are having insomnia issues. I had the munchies like nobody's business after trying this stuff though. Chill boat times follow after trying this strain!”
“Very nice. Strong high, but doesn't hit you all at once. Relaxing, and helps with anxiety and back pain.”
“Great taste”
“great head high with an all around happy mood. I could see how someone with a low tolerance could have anxiety with this strain.”

“This was what I had when I went to see Dr. Strange (an EXCELLENT movie to see high af, btw). It put me right there in the movie, the potent mellow gluing me to my seat and the high making me believe magic is real. I prefer straight sativas but this hybrid gave me the benefits of both in an easy compromise, busy head, relaxed body. Tastes nice, smokes nice, and makes you feel REAL nice.”
“Nice head high, short lasting but unique.”
“It was really good, but def more on the sativa side for me.  Pretty good day time high.”
“love it tried today, stoned for about 4-5hrs no visual high in my eyes so good there”
“it was good, pretty short high though”
“Leaves me in a good state of mind feeling no pain all around great”
“Instant stone, tastes more firey than anything else. Very high, feel relaxed and chilled. Definitely recommend”
“Wow!!”
“I really enjoyed this strain. Very nice mellow high for me.”
“This Strawberry Kush really helped me sleep well and feel a calmness,  It also helped my anxiety.  I will for sure try this strain again.  Thank you Arizona Organix”

“This shit is pretty good. I smoked a good amount of it last night id say probally 20 good bongs rips and a blunt. The high is peaceful and i got a major case of the munchies. kinda sleepy. also i was anxious to do shit. so yea this shit is good and it does have the slightest strawberry taste if u swallow u can taste it.”
“nice tasty pleasant smoke done what it said on the tin lol”
“The most uplifted I have felt from nearly any strain, and it made a long walk feel like nothing.”
“Nothing extraordinary. Nice smoke with no major bad bits. Good for relaxing but not particularly powerful.”
“Good strain, nothing very special but if you're a fan of sweet relaxing weed, that's your weed!”
“awsome taste”
“Strong, sweet and very strawberryish. Yum.”

“Great strain for chilling around the house. Has the body effects from an indica, but not in excess. I wasn't couch locked. Definitely a potent strain; I vaporized around .3 grams and had a good high.”
“creeper but good”
“nice flavor,it had a strong high.”

“creeps a little, but it's only ok.  it's a bit harsh.  doesn't smell good.  no crystals.  for 20 more you get just a bit better.  probably won't get again cuz 1 small bowl and throat harshed out.  unhappy.”
“love it deff a great strain wasn't sure but hella high now great Bud Word”
“A good strain.  Good high, but nothing spectacular imho”

“Heavier smoke. Very medicinal.. (came home with a headache and instantly relieved pressure and pain in my and blaines head (he had a headache 2). ). 
more of a stoney high. 
flavor wasn't really there. more of a slight sweetness. (falcor)”

“I had this strain in hash form. It was ultra potent! normally i am used to a lot strong straines but this lady knocked me out. it brought my body an verry intens numb feeling and a deep muscle relaxation.  my mind was a bit upset because i did'nt expect it to be sush a body high strain.”

“This might not be the case for every dispensary, but when I have the overwhelming physical symptoms of an Anxiety attack, This Lady neutralizes the excess energy, and allows me to calm myself down (Joint or Bowl).  Just a low enough Indica ratio at the place I got it (70%) to where I was able to shrug off the sleepiness effects. Vaporized version tastes more like a strawberry granola.  Had great pain relief on the va...”

“I personally think this strain is one of the best because it's caused me no dizziness or headache. I can smoke it regularly with my friends. There's quite a few strains that cause dizziness to some level and I personally don't like that feeling, nor do most of my friends lol.
The high creates a good relaxed zone.”

“When it comes to flavor, this is my go-to strain. It’s tasty as hell and it’s guaranteed to f**k you up. It comes on super quick and super strong. The flavor is amazing if you happen to roll a blunt (still tasty if you smoke it in another way). It’s really sweet tasting and the aroma is amazing. The nugs have a nice gold/green color with red hairs and they’re super dense if grown properly. Definitely a favorite of mi...”

“This strain tasted like wood chips smell like.  Leafly gives a good jab at describing it as musky" being a more positive leaning considering patchouli is a nice spicy version.  A bit ranker on the scale would be armpits which can go either way as for attraction.  Strawberry Kush is wet cardboard box musky with a high that is just as flimsy.  The flower structure was nothing short of fabulous with big fluffy light gr...”"
“Delicious, cerebral smoke. Ideas abound. Senses sing. Flavor tingles off the tongue on the finish. A great pleasure - whoever grew this knew what they were doing.”
“Helps to relax but still stay up”
“Completely concur with the horny and uninhibited reviews! Bye bye little blue pills! Helloooo strawberry kush!”

“Very nice strain. dense but still fluffy Nuggs. The high is Definitely hybrid, 50/50 indica-sativa. upper high in the beginning then panning out to a nice relaxing Indica experience. I recommend this Medical Strain for All smokers but Novice's take notice that this strain is quite potent, so expect a strong long lasting high and pack Munchies!! Enjoy! I know I do!”

“The taste is one of a kind. It's like smoking a joint with a strawberry flavoured paper. Very good for gaming, watching a film or anything that doesn't require much energy.

The only downside that I found is that it isn't very high in THC content... Not sure if something happened to the buds before purchasing them but the only reason I'd recommend this strain is because it has a taste to die for!

If you're a flavou...”"
“Instant favorite! Wow,I’m just so happy and relaxed it’s amazing! Perfect for evening with friends or just by yourself”
“I like this strain. It just makes me overly tired. I believe all kush has that effect on me so don’t mind me lol”
“Feels like being wrapped in a warm, soft blanket.”
“Tastes like strawberry, good Kush”

“Tonight’s medicine, Strawberry Kush. This one helps me Chillax. It tastes so nice on the exhale. Such a smooth strawberry flavor and yummy kushiness that tickles your throat. The high is super Stoney with a creative buzz and hunger for food, lots of food...followed by a plant your ass in-da-couch and ready yourself for bed in an hour daze. Great nighttime, munch your face off and have a kick ass sleep medication.”
“El sabor mas frutal y dulce que eh probado”

“The strongest i have grown so far. Really powerful and a very distinct aroma. Very uplifting at the beginning and very sleepy after some time. Grows tall.

A must for growers.”
“Wow. The fruity scent and the relaxing high are great!”

“Nice subtle taste but the cut of this like other PNW strains is a bit less dense than what I'm particularly fond of.  First time trying any of the strawberry lineage and while I enjoy the flavor it is in fact subtle.  Nice joint weed, rolled a few and saw a synth pop band, had a really good time.  Definitely an indica heavy blend in my batch, but seems very balanced ratio.  I did enjoy it as a hybrid versus the typic...”

“A cost-effective option, but didn't get anything resembling strawberry in smell or taste.  I found the high to balance me out evenly (not overly euphoric or too heady), so felt a bit short changed.  It's a perfectly fine strain, but as a naturally mellow and introverted person, its not generally what I'm looking for when I smoke.

Strawberry Kush's biggest strength is that it's really great for sex.  I wouldn't say i...”
“I gave this kush five stars, but if I could give it 4.5 I would because of dry mouth and no strawberry flavour. That is all.”

“This strain is quickly becoming a favourite in my medical bag.  It gets into the body and Neuro pains within minutes and the relief is for a few hours. The taste is superb but dry eyes and mouth are typically followed. Well worth it for the pain relief effects.”
“It’s mellow and just ugh all around a great strain for me at least. 10 stars if I could!”
“Really enjoying this”
“Smells sweet like strawberries”
“Great flavor, with fast relief”
“When I was anxious it made my anxiety worse but when I was happy it encouraged that as well (shrug) lol”
“good strand”
“I tried it with my friends and the effect Happy" is very strong I enjoyed it a lot
column4: the nice thing is being relaxed while enyojing it .. Recommended.”"

column3:
“I taste no strawberry but yeah men it's nice and euphoric.
Enjoy!”
“bud smelled like a mid.. smoked it and it had a slight taste of strawberry but not a lot and the high sucked.. wasted 40 bucks on 2 g's..”
“Beautiful, smooth taste. Don't pass up an opportunity to smoke this.”

“Definitely one of the best strains i have smoked, left a nice sensation in the mouth and teeth as well, takes around 10 minutes to kick in but once it does you know it. Wasnt completely couch locked but i started feeling sleepy after a while! Definitely worth a try!!”
“Amazing all around, instantly feel it after 2 hits off the bong, the smell is so good and the taste is like strawberry Fanta, highly recommend you try it when you can”

“One advice: dont smoke it, Vape it! It really tastes like strawberries! second advice vape it btw 365°and 375° not higher thats its sweet spot. Gives you a good uplifted high but still allows you to remain focus. Did not make me too tired.”
“This strain will put you to sleep boi.”

“This strain is something else i must say. Not only does it arrouse your sex drive, you also tend to get madly tired and exhausted. Taste wonderful. Make sure you dont eat anything to flavorful or you wont be able to taste the strawberry after taste. Has a slight harsh burn. For a sativa based im so in love with this strain.”

“Took this on an Friday evening, alone in Amsterdam waiting for my connection flight to leave the next day. Plan was to party the night through. After hitting some puffs from a pure this strain knocked me out big time. Got a little panicky and ended up sleeping in the airport laying on a counter. 
I had a very intense head high with my body all super warm especially my central chest feeling like it's burning.
If not c...”

“Great smell, look and taste, this packs a real cerebral punch. Prepare for the 'wow' factor when you take a hit, this shit is bananas (well, strawberry). Euphoric buzz that strays more to a 'let's go out and do something' sort of high. If that's not your thing, understandable but it's worth trying for taste and potency alone.”
“Easily the best tasting bud I've had in a verry long time, however my mouth was dry as hell the entire time.”
“Ehh. It was alright. The buds broke up like popcorn. Very crystally. Smelled alright, but nothing like strawberries. Didn't taste like strawberries either. I've had better.”

“It was a creeper for me , but it wasn't that great in my opinion , we had about half an ounce of this , and we got sick of it with in the 3rd blunt , I rated it a 3 well cause I like the creeper haha”

“Red tight buds. Smells very fruity, tastes like strawberries but not the actual fruit, more like strawberry flavoured candy. Very sweet.  Hits at a medium pace.  Relaxing, heart slowing high from OG and happy feeling from Strawberry cough.  Nice strain for STRESS relief or MOTIVATION.”

“I actually just grew this unbelievable strain. They flowered for 9 weeks before I harvested. Let them dry and cure out for about 3 weeks before I tried it... not only is this the most interesting strain taste wise, the high is unreal. Through a bong, this strain literally tastes like hashy earthy strawberries with that pungent kush. (My seeds were strawberry cough x OG kush). The high is very well balanced. It starts...”
“First time I've ever cried smoking weed. It was a very scary experience and I was very paranoid and fucked up. Stay away from this shit.”

“pretty good bud, it looks great and taste how it looks not really like strawberry though i wasnt expecting it. when you hit it it taste good and gets deep in your lungs making you cough. it definitely put me in a better mood for the day and its a great happy high it made me slightly lazy though.”
“Good Strain! Really Relaxes You & It's Makes You More Alert & Fulll Of Energy!”
“Really good strain, made me feel very creative and focused, gives you a proper sleepy, tired sort of feeling. Would defiantly recommend this strain to anyone who has trouble sleeping!”
“My favorite indica to date. Unfortunately, having sex" is not listed as an option under activities...because this is the best strain for that!”"
“Very fruity tasting bud. Usual effects; keeps me active, but decreases my appetite a bit.”

“this is one fierce lady,
very relaxed buzz,makes me hungry.
very good for pain”
“Personal favorite atm, it's great for my back pain, gave me a very creative/happy/energetic first hour and a half then had me wanting to just chill, very potent strain, would recommend.”
“Such a good experience. Made me really relax in my happy bubble. the smoke was very soft to the throat, and exhaling gave a sweet afterwhiff of strawberry. only thing: red eyes guaranteed”
“Love this strain man! It's super smooth and smoke tastes great. Smoked it out of a Bong and it was a great experience. Bought the 1/2 here in GA for 125$... Steal of a price if u ask me!”
“good hybrid for daily smoking while working or on the go wish there were more strains like this flavor and smell out. this hybrid was stronger sativa i feel more than indica .”
“Mild head high with a peaceful resonance throughout the body”

“One word: yes. 👍 

Beautiful hybrid with strong lineage. This is a happy, goofy strain that will immediately put you in a good mood. Can't recommend Strawberry Kush enough for patients coping with trauma or depression. Physical effects are subtle but present, sparking the nerves just enough to tingle without knocking you to sleep. Incredible smell right out of the package, too! 💚 11/10 would toke again”

“I got to grow this unbelievable strain. Got 3 fem seeds popped them all and got 3 huge and beautiful plants. First off, the bud structure and smell that comes off is literally the most intriguing smell that a bud has ever offered me. It is ridiculously sweet smelling with pine and pungency in the background. 3/4 of the buds also are very nicely structured and are HUGE. Am In week 3 of cure so I've just been starting ...”

“I've been smoking a lots of different strain in the last 4 years since I moved to Canada. This is one of the best you can have, it's really good sweet taste and makes you high but accurate and active.
Is awesome!”

“Took the edge off the pain enough to push through it. For an indica it wasnt very sleepy. Very uplifting and would be a good start to a day, or a day long smoke. No real head trip, but no body stone either.”
“First time It had me high for hours.”
“a nice chill-out indica-dominant strain. not usually a big fan of indica-dominants, but strawberry kush was definitely an exception. sweet, strong, and kind of earthy in a way. wonderful.”
“First strain that I've ever smoked, made me feel amazing and happy.”

“It's awesome. Great strawberry taste and smell. Smoked 4 bowls then got completely fried. But it's a creeper for sure. Took like 10 mins after I smoked to kick in. I felt sleepy, relaxed, and really happy. More of a indica when I tried it”
“The very first legit kush" or at least OG kush i ever tried. Really carried from both sides
column4: equally sweet/berry but with that back end of pungency. Leaned more towards sativa in buzz
column5: i do remember it being really cerebral with the onset but faded into relaxation later on.”"

column3: “Great strain for a party with girls.”
“strain info is incorrect. seeds are available, mine just arrived. will update after harvest.”
“Very euphoric, has a nice taste, and continues to make me feel like a piece of butter melting from how mellow I am. I love it!”

“The absolute best strain I've had. You get high from one jay or bowl easily. You get a really nice body high, giving you no motive to move and just relax. You get very giggly about everything, but also are able to zone out and feel lifted. Good for depression, anxiety, and restless sleepers.”

“good flavor and a enjoyable smoke. but on another level it is a great strain for Amputee's battling phantom limb pain which Leafly I would like to see a section in the medical selections please and I'll do my best to keep the reviews coming. helped alot to relax but didn't feel lazy.”
“Had outdoor grown sk and it was fair. Very pleasant. Nice daytime strain that keeps you focused, energetic, still with a very nonchalant body high. No where near my favorite but gets the job done!”

“Really fresh green healthy nugs. Didn’t grind well though. Ran it through the pax 3 vaporiser. Very strong strain. Immediate effect. Long lasting high. Real nice and after about 40 mins the eyes go dry and the body buzz kicks in. Hope you don’t have plans!”
“great fun laughter buzz”
“NICE flavor! Happy high”
“Tasted like imitation strawberries, smelled unique, very nice buzz.”
“This strain makes gets me high and I really enjoy the medical effects. I rolled my ankle the other day and I dont feel it.”
“Great taste. Love it.”
“Strongest  Weed I've ever smoked. Tasted the strawberry and very potent, very.”
“This marijuana strain is awesome, so good for skeletal pain and works amazing for anxiety!”
“This strain is one of my new favorites, it gives you a wonderful uplifting high. It doesn't have the couch-lock" affect
column4: you can be active and get things done. It has a very sweet taste to it. if your in San Diego looking for this strain
column5: visit southwest patient group in San Ysidro!”"

column3: “Very uplifting. Made me feel energetic. Great for wake and bake”
“I was expecting this to be an awesome strain due to it being a hybrid of strawberry cough/og kush, made me have palpitations and strong anxiousness.”
“Smells amazing! Earthy and sweet!”

“First time I tried it, I bought a gram of it in Amsterdam, rolled it into a joint and it's become one of my favorites.  The smell is sweet and fruity, the bud is frosted with trichomes and wonderfully sticky, and the taste in great! The smoke is much sweeter than most strains, it tastes kind of like incense. It is a very inspiring high, enough to make me want to write a review about it.”
“Love this strain so much. I love the body high and the sensations. Not for novice smokers. But a few good bong rips and you're good on this”
“I must say this strain blew me away. And i am no novice smoker. The one i have here is clearly heavy in indica but it has an amazing smell and taste of citrusy strawberry. An instant favorite!”
“It feels like getting a massage down your spine, and a funny feeling around your teeth, and a weird feeling around stomach, but most importantly, this is a munchie strain, so be prepared!”
“Delicious. Got it on a coffeshop at the Hague, 5$ for a big fat blunt. The taste is incredible. I slept like a baby.”

“this strain is super strong yes you do get paranoid and dizzy but u just need to chill out and relax
very powerful”
“Love it”

“Being an Indica Girl. I was quite please with this hybrid strain. I have to choose my sativas carefully as they can make me feel jittery. This is a perfect 50/50 of OG Kush and Strawberry Cough. Nice body feel. Very nice head feel. Long lasting feel. Calming, definitely helps with pain. Feel like I could run errands or take a nap.”
“Worst smoking experience of my life. Paranoia, anxiety, depression, I call it the devil's weed and that's not a compliment.”

“Very nice smoke, noticeable sweet flavour and smooth on the lungs. It flipped my mood almost instantly; the effects come on very quickly. Was not very talkative at all while high, but very chilled out. I found it easy to focus on what we were watching. I believe this is an indica dominant hybrid (around 80/20), which is shown in the effects as you’ll feel great throughout your entire body. We went straight to the sof...”
“tastes just like it smells, amazing”
“made me really happy nice sweet taste and good sleepy relaxation. only tried in the evening”
“AWESOME STRAIN!!!!!!!!! I was totally stoned, but functional! Comidies and a nice couch are your friend. Body and euphoric sensations, feel amazing. Not a strain for a beginer!”
“To my personal effect. This specific strain; though the very exquisite taste; had a very paranoia like effect.”
“some good kush”
“Not as sweet as I expected but you can still taste the strawberry.”
“Nice high, bit of a lemon haze taste to it, not a long lasting high though”

“heyyyyy Brooklyn its your favorite Hebrew florist...Mr florist aka Mr flavours.. coming to u from the bedstuy brooklyn area.. i have Srrawberry Tohoe OG ..funny thing t
it such a new strained that its not in leafly banks yet..bed stuy crown heights and Brownsville will love this come check us Yehudi farms on instagram..we mit have your favorite medical strained this week never know ...”
“the good stuff”
“Only one Pain=Gone”

“I had this strain in an edible (sour belts) and it was amazing. I was able to taste the strawberry through the flavoring of the sour belts, which was amazing. I would love to try the flower, because this stuff made me feel so happy inside and gave me the energy to still do stuff around the house or where ever I was. It wasn't very good strain to workout on though. Would definitely try again and recommend.”

“I was hanging out with my friends thinking about having a nice time smoking weed and just having a good time. Well what happened was not expected. This strain had us sitting in the parking lot of Taco Bell with 40 dollars worth of food in our laps with eyes redder than the devils dick. If this weed was a car then it came at me at 70 mph.”
“Mojave Mind Meld!”
“I love this strain it smells absolutely amazing, it looks amazing, and it smokes amazing. I love it and would definitely recommend it to anyone.”

“For sounding so innocent, this bud will literally knock you on your ass. Absolutely fantastic high and great tasting, too. Just make sure that you have some water handy for when the dry mouth kicks in. The effects last a fairly short amount of time, which is honestly the only real down side. Definitely recommend this strain!”

“This has a very strong chemical taste. It reminded me of having a mouthful of chlorinated pool water. It smells, looks and sounds good but don't be fooled. It comes on strong and instead of relieving any anxiety and/or pain, it only added to it and left me with an irritating head-ache. One of the worse strains I've smoked. I'll never be able to trust another strain with the word Strawberry in the name.”
“First weed I ever smoked. It made me very paranoid. Not a happy experience. Stopped smoking weed for a year before I tried other strains that were much better. Do not recommend.”
